Personalized nutritional program counsel phone call versus personalize nutritional program self help Informative Booklet control group.There compare two group patient : First group : patient subject balance personalized nutritional program associate counsel monthly phone call ; compliance loss weight do monthly one year . Second group : patient subject balance personalized nutritional program associate self help informative Booklet ; compliance loss weight do six month one year first meeting .
